word_mean: 囊炎：第一跖骨头内侧的异常突起伴粘液囊形成，导致趾侧向或外翻移位

sentence.Network_en: The bunion, or misaligned bones in the big toe, is clearly visible.
sentence.Network_cn: 拇指囊肿, 大拇指的骨关节可看到明显的错位.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 常用医学词汇_百度文库 ... knee and hip replacement 膝盖和臀关节置换 bunions 拇囊炎(拇指外翻) slipped disc 椎间盘突出.
人体医学专业词汇英语翻译 ... 拉埃内克 Laennec,Rene Theophile 拇囊肿 bunion 林德 Lind,James.
骨科临床词汇_噬魂_新浪博客 ... 摩顿氏病（跖骨痛症） Morton’s disease 姆囊炎 bunion 姆内翻 hallux varus.
...下。跖骨远端的滑膜炎侵蚀骨骼形成囊性改变。滑膜性肉芽肿的扩大以及骨骼的塌陷都促使局部形成胼胝和囊肿。拇囊炎(bunion)发生于第1 跖趾关节的内侧面，小趾囊炎(bunionette)发生于第5 跖趾关节的外侧面。囊肿表面.

list.abs: 导致脚趾外翻(bunions)或鸡眼(corns)。 ∮正确的穿法：尽量减少穿著它们的时间，如果你今天穿楔形鞋，明天就换穿平一点的鞋子。
...巴利巴宁球场编辑(拥抱大海的波澜壮阔)，，巴利巴宁球场(Bally bunion)巴利巴宁球场是完美的林克斯球场、因善于开发(利用自然地形而闻名)巴利巴宁球场风景秀丽(环境幽雅)设施完善(这里有两个18洞锦标赛球场、老球场和凯欣球场、各有特色、但均属真正的林克斯球场.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 18th cent.: ultimately from Old French buignon, from buigne 'bump on the head'

entry.def: A bunion is a large painful lump on the first joint of a person's  big toe.

means.word_mean: 1. a painful swelling of the bursa of the first joint of the big toe

auth_sentence.content: The only real cure is surgery, but it isn't a particularly pleasant operation and the bunion often reappears.
auth_sentence.res_content: The only real cure is surgery, but it isn't a particularly pleasant operation and the bunion often reappears.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The only real cure is surgery, but it isn't a particularly pleasant operation and the bunion often reappears.

auth_sentence.content: I had a bunion operation this summer, and I recovered on this sofa with a pile of books, watching it rain outside.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: I had a bunion operation this summer, and I recovered on this sofa with a pile of books, watching it rain outside.

auth_sentence.content: It's possible you may be able to walk on your foot immediately after a bunion procedure.
